entry.title: ACWing
entry.content:
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
using LL = long long;
int main(){
cin.tie(nullptr)->sync_with_stdio(false);
int N, M, a, b, ma = 0, mb = 0;
for(cin >> N; N; N -= 1){
cin >> a;
ma = max(ma, a);
}
for(cin >> M; M; M -= 1){
cin >> b;
mb = max(mb, b);
}
cout << ma << " " << mb;
return 0;
}

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
using LL = long long;
int main(){
cin.tie(nullptr)->sync_with_stdio(false);
int N, K;
cin >> N >> K;
vector v(N);
for(LL& x : v) cin >> x;
sort(v.begin(), v.end(), greater());
LL L = 1, R = 2E9;
while(L < R){
LL M = (L + R + 1) >> 1;
LL need = 0;
for(int i = 0; i < (N + 1) / 2; i += 1) need += max(0LL, M - v[i]);
if(need <= K) L = M;
else R = M - 1;
}
cout << L;
return 0;
}

ğŸ˜€ğŸ¤¡ğŸ¤¡ğŸ¤¡ğŸ¤¡ğŸ¤¡ğŸ¤¡#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
using LL = long long;
int main(){
cin.tie(nullptr)->sync_with_stdio(false);
int T;
for(cin >> T; T; T -= 1){
int N;
cin >> N;
vector p(N + 1), ans(N + 1), vis(N + 1);
for(int i = 1; i <= N; i += 1) cin >> p[i];
for(int i = 1; i <= N; i += 1) if(not vis[i]){
vector v;
for(int u = i; not vis[u]; u = p[u]){
v.push_back(u);
vis[u] = 1;
}
for(int x : v) ans[x] = v.size();
}
for(int i = 1; i <= N; i += 1) cout << ans[i] << " ";
cout << "\n";
}
return 0;
}
